S.FORM: milimulak u sulit nu Hulam: sapibetik a kamu nu Sakizaya p.170 171 ipabaway a di'tu amin mudadiw kami tu nikanamuhan namu a dadiw maydih paaninen kami tu mulcekay nu nipasepi i mahiniay a demiaday mahinitu caay kalawpes ku limulak ku sepi ku kapah di'tu aw izaw tu kuni patungus niyam tu matumesay anipatahka na pasepian kina tademaw nu luma' amin zakecen tu ku kapah atu limulak ku nikauzip adasay limulak ku pulecuhan isu a demiad! kukay! pipada'su nu misu i takuwan. . masatekeday a sulit limulak ipabaway mudadiw paaninen mulcekay nipasepi patungus zakecen
